definition: of or relating to the tarsal bones (or other wedge-shaped bones), an ancient wedge-shaped script used in Mesopotamia and Persia
details:
adjective
- of or relating to the tarsal bones (or other wedge-shaped bones)
- shaped like a wedge
= synonyms: cuneal, wedge-shaped
noun
- an ancient wedge-shaped script used in Mesopotamia and Persia
